name: Pilgrimage (itch) (Dexterdashing)
description: Our game Pilgrimage is an interactive graphic novel game featuring striking visuals and a spellbinding theme of "light and shadow". We want that the combination of a game and a comic, and the control given to the reader over the pace at which they experience the story makes it more impactful than it could be in a more conventional novel format. Throughout the journey, the mix of art, music, and interactivity keeps the player engaged with three separate senses and allows them to experience the narrative in a very particular way
